Class Flight

java.lang.Object
Flight
public class Flight
extends java.lang.Object
Project: Swarm Capstone : Organize and Execute control routines for drone algorithms

    Flight()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void aggregate​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
    Directs movement of fireteams, can direct them to move to the same point if to far away, or perform modified leeroyJenkins if they are close enough
    static void aggregateStutter​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
    Aggregate drones to separate into fireteams to perform stutter step
    static void brainSwarm​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
    This algorithm send drones forward to flight the enemy while fire teams climb to gain a height advantage

    helper function to determine if the enemy swarms have been deveated

    determines if the drones in a fireteam are close enough to each other to keep moving

    helper function to find the abs difference in the position of two drones
    static void fireTeam​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
    this algorithm separates drones into 4 fire teams that will act and move together - David & Manny
    static void flank​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, int check, Swarm Attackers)
    Flanking organizes a group of drones where one group performs leeroy jenkins while one attempts to roll around the side
    static void gameOver​(Swarm Victors)
    Print a victory message
    static void LeeroyJenkins​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
    The Original Algorithm, drones lock on and target the closest drone to them
    private static double magnitude​(Drone soldier, Swarm defender, int index)
    calculates the distance between two drones, a friendly and an enemy
    static void modifiedLeeroyJenkins​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
    modified version of leeroyJenkins to work with the fireteams, move all drones directly at closest enemy
    static void modifiedStutterStep​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
    A modified leeroy jenkins to perform stutter step, for those drones who are not flanking
    static void solve​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> sixth, int team, Swarm Attackers)
    Directs movement of fireteams, can direct them to move to the same point if to far away, or perform solution to find optimal place to move
    static void StutterStep​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
    Based of Starcraft stutter step of players, moves forward and back to try and juke the enemy

  • Method Details

    • LeeroyJenkins

      public static void LeeroyJenkins​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
      The Original Algorithm, drones lock on and target the closest drone to them
      Parameters:
      swarms - the arrayList of swarms
      Attackers - the swarm that targets and attacks

    • flank

      public static void flank​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, int check, Swarm Attackers)
      Flanking organizes a group of drones where one group performs leeroy jenkins while one attempts to roll around the side
      Parameters:
      swarms - the arrayList of swarms, containing drones
      check - a check variable to execute a different section of flank from the controller
      Attackers - the swarm that targets and attacks

    • fireTeam

      public static void fireTeam​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
      this algorithm separates drones into 4 fire teams that will act and move together - David & Manny
      Parameters:
      swarms - a collection of all swarms in the battle
      Attackers - the swarm to aggregate the drones inside

    • brainSwarm

      public static void brainSwarm​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
      This algorithm send drones forward to flight the enemy while fire teams climb to gain a height advantage
      Parameters:
      swarms - the arrayList of swarms, containing drones
      Attackers - the swarm that target and attacks

    • StutterStep

      public static void StutterStep​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
      Based of Starcraft stutter step of players, moves forward and back to try and juke the enemy
      Parameters:
      swarms - the arrayList of swarms, containing drones
      Attackers - the swarm that targets and attacks

    • gameOver

      public static void gameOver​(Swarm Victors) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Print a victory message
      Parameters:
      Victors - the swarm that won
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - handles a thread.sleep if necessary, fucks with the GUI though

    • checkAlive

      public static boolean checkAlive​(java.util.ArrayList<Swarm> swarms, Swarm Attackers)
      helper function to determine if the enemy swarms have been deveated
      Parameters:
      swarms - all the swarms in the battle
      Attackers - the hypothesized victorious swarm
      Returns:
      true if the enemy has no drones left alive, otherwise false

    • checkLocationAggregate

      public static boolean checkLocationAggregate​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter)
      determines if the drones in a fireteam are close enough to each other to keep moving
      Parameters:
      quarter - the fireteam of drones
      Returns:
      false if the drones are to far apart, otherwise true

    • differenceInPosition

      public static int differenceInPosition​(int x1, int x2)
      helper function to find the abs difference in the position of two drones
      Parameters:
      x1 - any coordinate of a drone
      x2 - the matching coordinate of another drone
      Returns:
      the integer representing the abs value of their difference

    • aggregate

      public static void aggregate​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
      Directs movement of fireteams, can direct them to move to the same point if to far away, or perform modified leeroyJenkins if they are close enough
      Parameters:
      quarter - the fireteam to move
      Attackers - the entire swarm of attackers, from which the fireteam came

    • aggregateStutter

      public static void aggregateStutter​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
      Aggregate drones to separate into fireteams to perform stutter step
      Parameters:
      quarter - the quarter of a swarm containing drones
      Attackers - the attacking drone swarm

    • solve

      public static void solve​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> sixth, int team, Swarm Attackers)
      Directs movement of fireteams, can direct them to move to the same point if to far away, or perform solution to find optimal place to move
      Parameters:
      sixth - the fireteam to move
      team - the number of the fireteam to move
      Attackers - the entire swarm of attackers, from which the fireteam came

    • modifiedLeeroyJenkins

      public static void modifiedLeeroyJenkins​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
      modified version of leeroyJenkins to work with the fireteams, move all drones directly at closest enemy
      Parameters:
      quarter - fireteam to be moved
      Attackers - the swarm from which the fireteams came from

    • modifiedStutterStep

      public static void modifiedStutterStep​(java.util.ArrayList<Drone> quarter, Swarm Attackers)
      A modified leeroy jenkins to perform stutter step, for those drones who are not flanking
      Parameters:
      quarter - the quarter of drones that perform leeroy jenkins
      Attackers - the attacking drone swarm

    • magnitude

      private static double magnitude​(Drone soldier, Swarm defender, int index)
      calculates the distance between two drones, a friendly and an enemy
      Parameters:
      soldier - the current drone we want to see how far away it is from another drone
      defender - the enemy drone swarm to calculate the distance to
      index - the index of the enemy drone
      Returns:
      the normalized distance from the enemy to friendly drone
